ABOUT

About

Faithfully participating in God’s work of building His church, so that the body of Christ is established and God’s name is glorified.

Our Mission

Faithfully participating in God’s work of building His church, so that the body of Christ is established and God’s name is glorified.

  • Building life with life; building community with truth.
  • Proclaiming the gospel and shepherding souls within the local Chinese community in the Triangle area of North Carolina.
  • Following the leading of the Holy Spirit and responding faithfully to the local mission God gives in this generation.

The church is God’s work, not a human enterprise. Our highest standard is whether it glorifies Christ and aligns with Scripture.

Purpose

Love one another, build together, and serve locally.

Love One Another
Centered on Christ’s love, we cultivate a community of mutual care and edification (John 13:34–35).
Build Together
On the foundation of Christ and Scripture, we build faithfully with truth and life—not outward form or personal achievement.
Local Mission
Rooted in the local Chinese community, we proclaim the gospel, nurture believers, and become a channel of renewal in the region.

Statement of Faith

Christ is the only foundation of the church
Jesus Christ is the cornerstone and the only foundation (1 Cor 3:11; Eph 2:20).
Scripture is the highest authority
The Bible is God’s complete revelation and the final authority for teaching and practice.
The apostolic foundation is already laid
The church is built on the foundation of the apostles and prophets (Eph 2:20); we build faithfully upon it today.
Christ-centered ministry
All ministry and life are evaluated under the judgment of Christ and Scripture.

Leadership

Preacher Xinhua Zou
Preacher

This is an English starter translation of the leader introduction. Replace with an official English bio if available.

God has called us to remain local and serve the Chinese community in the Triangle area with evangelism and discipleship.

Our family desires to continue being used by the Lord as His instruments.

仁爱三角区华人教会
